price: So We seized him and his soldiers and flung them into the sea[16]. See how was the end of the wrongdoers!
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: [16] Allah caused them to enter the sea in pursuit of Moses and the believers.
